name: 薄い
description: thin, pale, light, watery, dilute, sparse, weak (taste, etc.), slim (probability, etc.), small

name: 畑
description: field (for fruits, vegetables, etc.), cultivated land, vegetable plot, kitchen garden, plantation, field (of specialization), sphere, area, womb, birth, birthplace

name: 発表
description: announcement, publication, presenting, statement, communique, making known, breaking (news story), expressing (one's opinion), releasing, unveiling

name: 反対
description: opposition, resistance, antagonism, hostility, objection, dissension, reverse, opposite, vice versa, contrast

name: 比べる
description: to compare, to make a comparison, to compete, to vie

name: 秘密
description: secret, secrecy, confidentiality, privacy, mystery, secret (e.g. to success), esoteric teachings

name: 美容院
description: beauty parlour, beauty parlor, beauty salon, hairdressing salon

name: 匹
description: counter for small animals, counter for rolls of cloth (two han in size), counter for horses, roll of cloth

name: 髭
description: moustache, beard, whiskers, whiskers (on a cat, etc.), feelers (on an insect, etc.), (chin) tuft, shadow (on a candlestick chart)

name: 必ず
description: always, without exception, necessarily, certainly, without fail, positively, invariably

name: 表
description: surface, face (i.e. the visible side of an object), front (of a building, etc.), obverse side (i.e. alternate_rea'headalternate_rea') of a coin, outside, exterior, appearance, public, first half (of an innings), top (of an inning), cover (for tatami mats, etc.), foreground

name: 表す
description: to represent, to signify, to stand for, to reveal, to show, to display, to express, to make widely known

name: 表情
description: facial expression, countenance, look, appearance, expression (vocal, etc.)

name: 描く
description: to draw, to paint, to sketch, to depict, to describe, to picture in one's mind, to imagine, to form a certain shape (e.g. path of an action, appearance of an object, etc.)

name: 不安
description: anxiety, uneasiness, worry, apprehension, fear, insecurity, suspense

name: 不思議
description: wonderful, marvelous, strange, incredible, amazing, curious, miraculous, mysterious, strangely enough, oddly enough, for some reason, curiously

name: 不味い
description: bad (taste), unpalatable, unsavoury, unsavory, awful, terrible, unpleasant, poor, unskillful, unskilful, bungling, clumsy, ugly, unattractive, homely, plain, awkward, problematic, troublesome, unfavorable, unfavourable, unwise

name: 付き合う
description: to associate with, to keep company with, to go out with, to go steady with, to get on with, to go along with, to follow someone's lead, to accompany someone, to compromise

name: 付ける
description: to attach, to join, to add, to append, to affix, to stick, to glue, to fasten, to sew on, to apply (ointment), to furnish (a house with), to wear, to put on, to keep a diary, to make an entry, to appraise, to set (a price), to allot, to budget, to assign, to bring alongside, to place (under guard or doctor), to follow, to shadow, to load, to give (courage to), to keep (an eye on), to establish (relations or understanding), to turn on (light)

name: 布団
description: futon (quilted Japanese-style mattress laid out on the floor), round cushion used for Zen meditation (traditionally made of woven bulrush leaves)

name: 負ける
description: to lose, to be defeated, to succumb, to give in, to surrender, to yield, to be inferior to, to break out in a rash due to (e.g. lacquer, shaving, etc.), to reduce the price, to lower the price, to give a discount on

name: 部長
description: head (chief, director) of a section or department, head of a (school) club, head of a (school) team

name: 沸かす
description: to boil, to heat, to excite, to melt (metal)

name: 沸く
description: to grow hot (e.g. water), to boil, to be in a state of excitement, to get excited, to take place energetically, to erupt (e.g. in applause, cheers)

name: 仏
description: Buddha, merciful person, Buddhist image, the dead, dead person, spirit of the dead

name: 物価
description: prices of commodities, prices (in general), cost-of-living

name: 物凄い
description: terrific, staggering, tremendous, incredible, extreme, frightful, ghastly, horrific, terrible, awful, gruesome, eerie

name: 分かれる
description: to branch, to fork, to diverge, to separate, to split, to divide, to disperse, to scatter

name: 文句
description: complaint, grumbling, objection, phrase, words, expression

name: 文句を言う
description: to complain, to make a complaint

name: 並ぶ
description: to line up, to stand in a line, to rival, to match, to equal

name: 並べる
description: to line up, to set up, to arrange in a line, to enumerate, to itemize, to be equal (to), to compare well (with), to be as good (as)

name: 閉まる
description: to be shut, to close, to be closed, to be firm (of a body, face, etc.), to be well-knit, to be locked, to tighten, to be tightened, to become sober, to become tense

name: 壁
description: wall, partition, barrier, obstacle, Chinese Wall constellation (one of the 28 mansions)

name: 別
description: distinction, difference, different, another, particular, separate, extra, exception

name: 別れる
description: to part (usu. of people), to part from, to part with, to be apart from, to separate (of a couple), to break up, to divorce, to lose (e.g. one's mother), to be bereaved

name: 変
description: strange, odd, peculiar, weird, curious, queer, eccentric, funny, suspicious, fishy, unexpected, change, incident, disturbance, disaster, accident, flat

name: 変える
description: to change, to alter, to transform, to convert, to turn, to vary, to reform, to revise, to amend

name: 変わる
description: to change, to be transformed, to be altered, to vary, to move to, to be different, to be uncommon, to be unusual

name: 片付ける
description: to tidy up, to put in order, to straighten up, to put away, to settle (problem), to clear (dispute), to finish, to bring something to an end, to marry off (e.g. a daughter), to do away with someone, to bump someone off

name: 編む
description: to knit, to plait, to braid, to compile (anthology, dictionary, etc.), to edit

name: 返る
description: to return, to come back, to go back, to turn over, (after the -masu stem of a verb) (to become) extremely, (to become) completely

name: 捕まえる
description: to catch, to arrest, to seize

name: 捕まる
description: to be caught, to be arrested, to hold on to, to grasp, to find (e.g. proof), to get (e.g. a taxi), to be detained by

name: 募集
description: recruitment, invitation, selection, advertisement, taking applications, raising (funds, donations, etc.), collection, subscription, solicitation, flotation (of shares, loans, etc.)

name: 暮れる
description: to get dark, to end, to come to an end, to close, to run out, to be sunk (e.g. in despair), to be lost

name: 包む
description: to wrap up, to tuck in, to pack, to do up, to cover with, to dress in, to conceal, to hide, to be engulfed in, to be enveloped by

name: 抱く
description: to hold in one's arms (e.g. a baby), to embrace, to hug, to have sex with, to make love to, to sleep with, to sit on (eggs), to brood

name: 放っておく
description: to leave alone, to leave as is, to ignore, to neglect

name: 縫いぐるみ
description: stuffed toy, stuffed animal, plush toy, soft toy, cuddly toy

name: 褒める
description: to praise, to admire, to speak well

name: 盆踊り
description: Bon Festival dance, Lantern Festival dance

name: 磨く
description: to polish, to shine, to brush (e.g. teeth), to refine, to improve

name: 又
description: again, once more, once again, another time, some other time, also, too, as well, likewise, on the other hand, while, and, in addition, besides, moreover, furthermore, or, otherwise, really, how, (what, why) on earth, indirect

name: 味
description: flavor, flavour, taste, charm, style, experience, smart, clever, witty, strange

name: 味噌
description: miso, fermented condiment usu. made from soybeans, innards (from crabs, shrimps, etc.) resembling miso, key (main) point, good part (of something), weakling, weak person

name: 味方
description: friend, ally, supporter, taking sides with, supporting, standing by, backing up

name: 未来
description: the future (usually distant), future tense, the world to come

name: 眠る
description: to sleep (not necessarily lying down), to die, to lie idle (e.g. of resources), to be dormant, to be unused, to close one's eyes

name: 無くなる
description: to be lost (e.g. luggage), to be missing, to be used up, to be run out, to be exhausted, to be consumed, to be reduced to zero, to not occur any more, to disappear (e.g. pain), to be lost (e.g. a dream, confidence)

name: 無駄遣い
description: waste (of money, time, etc.), squandering, frittering away

name: 無理
description: unreasonable, unnatural, unjustifiable, impossible, forcible, forced, compulsory, excessive (work, etc.), immoderate, to work too hard, to try too hard, irrational

name: 名
description: name, given name, title, fame, renown, reputation, pretext, pretense, justification, appearance

name: 名
description: counter for people (usu. seating, reservations and such), first name, famous, great, noun

name: 名様
description: counter for people (usu. seating, reservations and such)

name: 鳴る
description: to sound, to ring, to resound, to echo, to roar, to rumble

name: 毛
description: hair, fur, wool, down, plumage, feathers

name: 目茶苦茶
description: absurd, unreasonable, nonsensical, preposterous, incoherent, extreme, senseless, reckless, wanton, disorderly, chaotic, confused, messy, incredibly, really, so, super

name: 戻る
description: to turn back (e.g. half-way), to return, to go back, to recover (e.g. something lost), to be returned, to rebound, to spring back

name: 役に立つ
description: to be helpful, to be useful

name: 約束を守る
description: to keep a promise, to keep one's word

name: 勇気
description: courage, bravery, valour, valor, nerve, boldness

name: 誘う
description: to invite, to ask (someone to do), to call (for), to take (someone) along, to tempt, to lure, to entice, to seduce, to induce (tears, laughter, sleepiness, etc.), to arouse (e.g. sympathy), to provoke

name: 予定
description: plans, arrangement, schedule, program, programme, expectation, estimate

name: 揺れる
description: to shake, to sway, to waver

name: 様
description: appearing ..., looking ..., way to ..., method of ...ing, form, style, design, like, similar to, thing (thought or spoken)

name: 様子
description: state, state of affairs, situation, circumstances, appearance, look, aspect, sign, indication

name: 用
description: task, business, use, duty, service, call of nature, excretion

name: 用意
description: preparation, arrangements, provision, getting ready, laying out (e.g. a meal)

name: 落ち込む
description: to feel down, to feel sad, to be depressed, to be in low spirits, to be in a slump (business, economy, etc.), to be in an unfavourable condition, to fall into (e.g. a hole)

name: 落語
description: rakugo, traditional Japanese comic storytelling, comic story (told by a professional storyteller)

name: 落語家
description: rakugo story teller, comic story teller

name: 裏
description: bottom (or another side that is hidden from view), undersurface, opposite side, reverse side, rear, back, behind (the house), lining, inside, out of sight, behind the scenes, proof, opposite (of a prediction, common sense, etc.), inverse (of a hypothesis, etc.), bottom (of an inning), last half (of an inning)

name: 離れる
description: to be separated, to be apart, to be distant, to leave, to go away, to leave (a job, etc.), to quit, to give up, to lose connection with, to drift away from

name: 立てる
description: to stand up, to put up, to set up, to erect, to raise, to thrust into, to bury into, to dig into, to make (a noise), to start (a rumour), to raise (a cloud of dust, etc.), to cause, to make, to establish, to set up, to develop, to formulate, to put up (a political candidate), to make (one's leader), to treat with respect, to give (someone) their due, to make (someone) look good, to avoid embarrassing (someone), to sharpen, to make clear, to shut, to close, to make tea (matcha), to perform the tea ceremony, to divide by, to do ... vigorously

name: 留守
description: absence, being away from home, house-sitting, house-sitter, being left unattended to (of one's studies, etc.), neglecting

name: 留守番
description: care-taking, house-sitting, house-watching, staying at home, caretaker, house-sitter

name: 両
description: both (hands, parents, sides, etc.), counter for carriages (e.g. in a train), counter for vehicles, ryō, tael, traditional unit of weight (for gold, silver and drugs), 4-5 monme, 15-19 g, pre-Meiji unit of currency, orig. the value of one ryō of gold, traditional measure of fabric, 2 tan, unit of weight under the Ritsuryo system, 1/16 kin, 42-43 g, counter for suits of clothing, sets of armor, etc.

name: 寮
description: hostel, dormitory, bureau (government department beneath a ministry under the ritsuryo system), tea-ceremony room, villa

name: 隣
description: neighbor (neighbour), next to (esp. living next door to)

name: 例
description: custom, practice, habit, usual, said, aforementioned, instance, example, case, illustration, usage, precedent

name: 冷える
description: to grow cold (from room temperature, e.g. in refrigerator), to get chilly, to cool down

name: 礼
description: thanks, gratitude, manners, etiquette, bow, reward, gift, ceremony, ritual

name: 連れて行く
description: to take someone (to some place), to take someone along, to lead someone away

name: 連絡
description: to contact, to get in touch, contacting, getting in touch, communication, call, message, connection, coordination, junction, intercalary, intercalaris, internuncial

name: 奢る
description: to give (someone) a treat, to be extravagant, to live luxuriously, to be proud, to be haughty

name: 梳く
description: to comb (out), to card, to untangle (hair)

name: 淹れる
description: to make (tea, coffee, etc.), to brew a beverage (with hot water)

name: 餡
description: red bean paste, red bean jam, anko, kudzu sauce, filling (of a dumpling, bun, etc., e.g. ground meat, vegetables, bean paste), filling (generally), a substance wrapped in something else (e.g. cushion stuffing)

name: 饅頭
description: manjū, steamed yeast bun with filling

name: 騙す
description: to trick, to cheat, to deceive, to coax, to wheedle, to soothe and humor (humour)
